input sequence to an output value. LSTMs can support parallel input time series as separate
variables or features. Therefore, we need to split the data into samples maintaining the order of
observations across the two input sequences. If we chose three input time steps, then the ﬁrst
sample would look as follows:
Input:
10, 15
20, 25
30, 35
Listing 9.31: Example input from the ﬁrst sample.
Output:
65
